Name: Orb The Ball
About the game: A small yellow creature called Orb who has no ability to move stuck on a planet full of dangerous enemies and this planet is YOU. You are the only one who able to help him go through the multiple locations safely. Move the environment to roll him around the spikes, lava pits, and even lasers using various control mechanics from the basic platformer to a pinball like. Features: Control the world instead of the character 40 levels Multiple locations - mountains, underground, space and desert Various control mechanics Achievements
